title: URGENT: Lead Generation, Data Extraction, List Building Project
snippet:
Looking for a lead generation/data extraction specialist for a short term project. Project responsibilities include: researching and manually entering contact information into a spreadsheet to build lead lists for a sales team. The person who accepts this role will need to work quickly, as this project must be completed by Wednesday (11/2). If interested, please send a message with the following information as soon as possible

-qualifications - prior research/lead generation/data entry experience
-# of hours available to work on project
-available start date
